short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes JSON response easy to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open source JSON viewer
FEATURES
   •   JSON & JSONP support
   •   Syntax highlighting
   •   Collapsible trees, with indent guides
   •   Clickable URLs
   •   Toggle between raw and parsed JSON

Source: https://github.com/timleland/Json-Viewer-Extension
